message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand you have a budget constraint, Bob. However, I believe the product's value is worth more than your initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1600000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1500000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $1550000, which is just $50000 above your maximum offer. Let me know if that's something you're comfortable with.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1500000, as I mentioned before. I'm not willing to go any higher.
